title: Development of the potential of the digital economy of Russian regions through artificial intelligence humanisation
research_description: This paper aims at balancing the interests of business and society in the digital economy to reduce the social risks of the Fourth Industrial Revolution. It studies the potential for humanisation of AI in Russian regions through responsible innovations, production, logistics, and marketing, contributing to SDGs 9-12.
research_results: The econometric modeling demonstrates significant potential for AI humanisation in Russia’s digital economy, highlighting the role of public administration and responsible corporate practices in improving regional quality of life.
future_research: Further research should investigate AI humanisation in other regions and sectors, focusing on aligning technological progress with sustainable development goals.
